backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the trust portal backend, handling user profiles, contact form submissions, photo/video uploads with blob storage, and access-controlled admin operations using Internet Computer's authorization system.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the update of the founder section motto text in Home.tsx from 'सेवा परमो धर्मः' to 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः' with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON file containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key content of each component, page, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes using OKLCH values for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell titled 'Trust Portal' that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for Home, About, Programs, Donations, Gallery, Contact, and Admin pages nested under a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Manavdeep Seva Trust branding, quick navigation links, founder/contact details, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that composes Navigation and Footer around a TanStack Router Outlet to provide a consistent page shell across all routes.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation bar with the trust logo, desktop and mobile menus for six main routes, and a conditionally rendered Admin link shown only when the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing access control with an admin token when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions including contact form submission, photo/video upload, fetching all photos/videos, and deleting photos/videos.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a warm, earthy CSS custom property color palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page component displaying the organization's founder info, history, mission, and values with styled sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin page that requires Internet Identity authentication and provides UI for uploading/deleting photos and videos via tabbed forms with progress feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying organization contact details and a form for submitting inquiries, using the useContactForm mutation hook with success feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Donations.tsx: Donations page for Manavdeep Seva Trust displaying impact statistics, preset donation amounts with descriptions, and payment method options (UPI, bank transfer, card) with a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Gallery page that fetches and displays photos and videos from the API using tabs, showing loading spinners and empty-state placeholders when no media is available.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring a hero banner, founder profile section for Anjani Dwivedi, and links to programs and contact pages for GreenStripe Trust.
frontend/src/pages/Programs.tsx: Programs page rendering a grid of six initiative cards (Education, Environment, Healthcare, Community, Skills, Agriculture) with icons, descriptions, and detail bullet points.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch CSS variables, typography, border radius, box shadows, keyframe animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the current build state (version 23) of the Manavdeep Seva Trust website, listing implemented features, known issues (founder photo crop), architectural notes, and requirement IDs for homepage, about, programs, contact, navigation, footer, design theme, logo, and admin panel.
